body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature     Animals     Insects, Spiders, Centipedes, Millipedes                Insects, Spiders, Centipedes, Millipedes        In the fall you may see tarantulas crossing the roads looking for a mate.        Salinas Pueblo Missions is home to a variety of insects and arachnids including:         Desert Centipedes Tarantulas Silkworms Velvet Ants Tarantula Hawks Praying Mantises Jerusalem Crikets Cicadas Dragonflies  And More!
title: Salinas Pueblo Missions National Monument: Insects, Spiders, Centipedes, Millipedes
